front.title: IEEE Standard Signaling Method for a Bidirectional Parallel Peripheral Interface for Personal Computers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A signaling method for asynchronous, fully interlocked, bidirectional parallel communications between hosts and printers or other peripherals is defined. A format for a peripheral identification string and a method of returning this string to the host outside of the bidirectional data stream is also specified<>
